Method Detail

isFree

public boolean isFree(CartPt coords)
Checks if the position (x,y) == coords is free.

Parameters:
coords - the coordinate to check
Returns:
if the position is free.

isFree

public boolean isFree(Block b)
Checks if the position of the block is free.

Parameters:
b - the block
Returns:
true if the position is free, otherwise false is returned.

add

public boolean add(Block b)
Adds b to the blocklist if there's no other block a the position of b.

Parameters:
b - the block to add
Returns:
true if the add is done, otherwise false is returned. False indicates that the position is already blocked.

draw

public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g,
                 int blocksize,
                 int gap)
Draws the blocklist on the graphic device g. Each block is draw with his own method.

Parameters:
g - the graphic device.
blocksize - the size of a block in pixel
gap - the gap in pixel

findFullLines

public int[] findFullLines(int width,
                           int height)
Returns an array with the numbers of full lines.

Parameters:
width - is the width of the field.
height - is the hight of the field.
Returns:
an array with all full lines.

removeLines

public void removeLines(int[] lines,
                        de.unifreiburg.informatik.tetris.game.Points p)
Delete the lines given in the array.

Parameters:
lines - the full lines
p - the point to increase

isGameLost

public boolean isGameLost()
Checks if the game is lost. That means, check if there is a block with y coordinate equals 0.

Returns:
if the game is lost.

isEmpty

public boolean isEmpty()
returns if the blocklist is empty.

Returns:
if the blocklist is empty.
